actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain corporations and certain trusts to be shareholders of subchapter S corporations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a corporation to be a shareholder of a subchapter S corporation (small business) if each shareholder of such corporation is permitted to be a shareholder of an S corporation. Allows certain additional trusts to be shareholders of such corporations.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain corporations and certain trusts to be shareholders of subchapter S corporations.
